subject: Order #SSN4258 - Status
description_text:
Hello,



I ordered the Simsonn Plus X Pedals on December 1st with order number
#SSN4258.

I paid for express shipping, which said it would be delivered in 3 to 7
days.

I received a confirmation email on December 1st and the payment was made on
the same day.

As of today, December 15th, I have not received any further information
regarding the shipment and the delivery deadline I paid for has already
passed.



I already sent an email on December 8th and received a reply directing me
to the "helpdesk". My ticket doesn't appear, and this website (helpdesk)
doesn't have any information about my order.



Please, I would like to know the status of my order and if there are any
problems with it.



Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best regards,



João Azevedo

conversations.body_text: Hi João Azevedo,  We apologize for the delay; your order is expected to arrive next week.
